title: EZ Heights Gives Ample Opportunities to Buyers & Sellers for Interacting with Each Other
text:
EZ Heights, a reputed online classified website in dubai , now makes it easy to communicate with fellow subscribers. They are creating a niche in the market by introducing a variety of communication options between buyers and sellers.
(PRWEB) October 20, 2015
EZHeights.com is a classified website for the purchase and sale of products/services in Dubai. It offers various classified categories, such as real estate, jobs, motors, and other items. The technically advanced website, strong navigation, and simple to use interface enables sellers to find the right buyers and vice versa. Further, there are several options for subscribers to directly interact with each other and solve their doubts & queries.
Explaining the features of the website, the Marketing head of EZ Heights said, “We completely understand the requirements of our subscribers, and hence, Ezheights.com has come up with distinctive features that ensure a win-win situation for buyers and sellers. The subscribers can make use of the chat option to speak to the other party and exchange the relevant information about the product/service. One can also send an offline message to let the other person know about his/her interest in the product. Members can view the profile of other members and check the items displayed by him/her across various categories. If the items seem to be of interest, then the buyer may send a request to follow the seller. Once a buyer follows a seller, the buyer will receive a notification, every time the seller puts a product on display.”
All these elements contribute in rendering a smooth and seamless interaction between interested parties, thus aiding in fast and effective purchase and sale.
With a view to work in tandem with the current trends, the company has undertaken a responsive approach towards the website design, thus enabling subscribers to surf the site from a variety of devices, including mobiles and tablets. This makes the process simpler, as the members can now view the listings on the go, and they do not need to wait to log in from their computer or laptop. One can also intimate his/her family friends about the advertisement by sending the details through a messaging app on the mobile.
EZ Heights is a one-stop solution for any type of classified, ranging from real estate, jobs , or even items such as pets, antiques, and more. It has a comprehensive portfolio of products and services catering to almost every need, whim, and fancy of people staying in Dubai. For real estate, members have an option to choose their favorite property amidst 30,000+ properties . Further, one can also check out the advertisements in the neighboring or specified areas of the city. The next time one needs to post ad in classified website , one knows which website to surf.
